Missions

Ishtar Collective
Ishtar Sink, Venus
6 hours Remaining

Unravel the secrets of the Vex by reviving an ancient research station of the Ishtar Collective.

Angry

Minions of the Darkness won’t flinch, even after massive damage.

Heroic

Enemies appear in greater numbers and are more aggressive.

  • Level 22
  • Level 26
  • Level 30
Armor Upgrade
Cryptarch Engram +1
Spirit Bloom +10
Vanguard Marks +5
XP Bonus +4800
Armor Upgrade
Ascendant Materials +1
Cryptarch Engram +1
Spirit Bloom +12
Vanguard Marks +5
XP Bonus +6000
Armor Upgrade
Ascendant Materials +2
Cryptarch Engram +1
Spirit Bloom +16
Vanguard Marks +5
XP Bonus +7500
Rumble
The Crucible
6 hours Remaining

Prove your merit to the New Monarchy in pure combat. Kill everything. Watch your back.

Crucible Gear
Crucible Marks
Crucible Reputation
XP Bonus
Weekly Heroic Strike
Meridian Bay, Mars
6 hours Remaining

Confront Valus Ta'aurc, Fleet Commander of the Cabal Siege Dancers, before he destroys all of Freehold.

Heroic

Enemies appear in greater numbers and are more aggressive.

Lightswitch

Minions of the Darkness deal much more melee damage.

  • Level 24
  • Level 28
  • Level 30
Cryptarch Engram +1
Strange Coin +3
Vanguard Marks +3
Vanguard Reputation +150
Cryptarch Engram +1
Strange Coin +6
Vanguard Marks +6
Vanguard Reputation +250
Cryptarch Engram +1
Strange Coin +9
Vanguard Marks +10
Vanguard Reputation +400
Weekly Nightfall Strike
Meridian Bay, Mars
6 hours Remaining

Confront Valus Ta'aurc, Fleet Commander of the Cabal Siege Dancers, before he destroys all of Freehold.

Angry

Minions of the Darkness won’t flinch, even after massive damage.

Epic

Heavily shielded and highly aggressive enemies appear in great numbers.

Juggler

No ammo drops for your equipped weapon.

Lightswitch

Minions of the Darkness deal much more melee damage.

Nightfall

You will face a relentless army that has never known defeat. If all players die, you will be returned to orbit.

Unknown Rewards

Bounties

Eris Morn Bounties

Talk to Eris Morn in the Tower to claim these and to turn them in; she’ll have new bounties every day.

Bounty Description
Blades of Crota
Hunt the Knights who serve as Blades of Crota on Earth and the Moon. 		Hunt the Knights who serve as Blades of Crota on Earth and the Moon.
Hard Fall
Rapidly kill 4 Hive with a heavy weapon. Death will reset your progress. 		Rapidly kill 4 Hive with a heavy weapon. Death will reset your progress.
Out of Sight
Kill Hive from behind. 		Kill Hive from behind.
Sleight of Hand
Defeat Hive with precision damage using your throwing knife. 		Defeat Hive with precision damage using your throwing knife.
The Cleansing
Kill any Majors or Ultras in a Nightfall activity. 		Kill any Majors or Ultras in a Nightfall activity.

Crucible Bounties

The following Bounties are accomplished through Crucible gameplay. Once you complete a Bounty, return to the Bounty Tracker at the Tower to receive your reward.

Bounty Description
Broken Scholar
Defeat 25 Warlocks in the Crucible. 		Defeat 25 Warlocks in the Crucible.
Death or Glory
Complete 5 Clash Matches. 		Complete 5 Clash Matches.
Stay Golden
Complete 5 Rumble Matches. 		Complete 5 Rumble Matches.
Target Practice
Earn 10 Dead Man's Hand medals. 		Earn 10 Dead Man's Hand medals.
That's How I Roll
Earn 5 Multikill medals. 		Earn 5 Multikill medals.
The Wild Hunt
Defeat 25 Hunters in the Crucible. 		Defeat 25 Hunters in the Crucible.

Vanguard Bounties

You can complete the following Bounties through the Story Missions, Strikes, and Patrol Missions. Once a Bounty is complete, return to the Bounty Tracker at the Tower to receive your reward.

Bounty Description
Overcharge
Kill 2 enemies at once with a Fusion Rifle, 20 times. 		Kill 2 enemies at once with a Fusion Rifle, 20 times.
Patrol Cosmodrome
Complete 6 Patrol missions in the Cosmodrome. 		Complete 6 Patrol missions in the Cosmodrome.
Relic Harvest - Cosmodrome
Collect 200 Sensor Mites in Cosmodrome. 		Collect 200 Sensor Mites in Cosmodrome.
Relic Harvest - Mars
Collect 200 Olympus Tears on Mars. 		Collect 200 Olympus Tears on Mars.
Unstoppable
Earn 9000 Experience without dying. 		Earn 9000 Experience without dying.
Walking Tall
Complete any Strike without dying. 		Complete any Strike without dying.
